scripts.minify:
svgo --pretty --enable=removeXMLNS --disable=removeViewBox -f ./svg && echo 'Any files listed below use xlink; please clean them up manually or suffer EN-22022 (see the font folder README).
Cleaning up is usually as easy as replacing the <use> with the path/shape, deleting the <defs> and any ids, AND keeping any attributes that were in the <use> (i.e. fill-rule)
Alternatively, change the ID to be the filename of the icon:' && grep -rni 'xlink:href="#a"' ./svg || true
